name: STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent, v. Hopeton B. BROWN, Jr., Defendants and Lamar A. Jones, Defendant-Petitioner.

parties:

v.

attorneys: A petition for certification of the judgment in A-2466/4115-13 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

casebody.head_matter:
STATE of New Jersey, Plaintiff-Respondent,
v.
Hopeton B. BROWN, Jr., Defendants
and
Lamar A. Jones, Defendant-Petitioner.
C-540 September Term 2017
079881
Supreme Court of New Jersey.
February 2, 2018
To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:
A petition for certification of the judgment in A-2466/4115-13 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;
It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied.
